column1: * [[Gondolin]] is completed and [[Turgon]] secretly removes his people from [[Nevrast]].<ref>{{GA
* Before [[Turgon]] leaves [[Vinyamar]], [[Ulmo]] comes to him and instructs Turgon to leave armour and a sword behind. There will be worn as a token by [[Tuor
column2: a future warrior]] to warn him of impending Doom.<ref>{{GA
